Home / Videos / Interview with Mike Lee

Interview with Mike Lee

Description: Mike Lee is the Mayor of Appsterdam, a global community of app makers that was originated in Amsterdam. One of the most fascinating things about Appsterdam is that they actually have data to backup the claim that a vibrant tech community is a Good Thing for the greater community they exist within. The University of Amsterdam conducted a study and published their data, you can read the report.
Published: Jan 07, 2022
Watch on Youtube
